Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards

Class BuildBeforeAndAfter

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.DivinityDecoratorWithEffects
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.BuildBeforeAndAfter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Divinity
public class BuildBeforeAndAfter
extends DivinityDecoratorWithEffects
This divinity, Prometheus, is able to build before and after moving only if he does not go up by one level during the same turn. If he does not move up, he has the standard options.

Prometheus require a flag to check whether he has built before moving; if so he can move and then build again. We designed this divinity so that he can not be unable to move after building preliminary. To do so, we inserted some extra if conditions in legalBuild so that if he will not be able to move, he will not be able to build either.

    • legalBuild

      public boolean legalBuild​(Board board, Worker selectedWorker, Tile selectedTile)
      If the build before the movement will lead the worker to be blocked, such build is prevented. This is the reason why an ArrayList containing the possible moves after the build is created.
      Specified by:

      Overrides:
